main.name: Daniel Gomez
main.description: Software developer with 2+ years of work experience. Aiming to leverage my academic experience, and proven knowledge of programming to successfully become a better programmer
main.bio: I work mostly backend with some knowledge of react, I work mainly with java and python. In my spare time I like making prototypes in python. Look at my second github to check those out
main.contactmessage: If you would like to discuss a job position or a prototype idea email or call me, email is better I turn my phone off a lot.

resume.skillmessage: My main knowledge is in java but I work on my projects in python since its less writing

education.description: Graduated with honors at school I learned about testing, data structures and algorithms

education.degree: Bachlors of Engineering: Chemical Engineering (Didn't finish)

work.title: Associate Software Developer

Developed and tested new endpoints for different services
 Provided software support to product teams on an ad-hoc basis.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
Developed and maintained front end made with in-house coding language.
 Designed and implemented backend features using spring boot, GO, AWS, and docker.
 Tested and fixed new features and legacy code.

work.title: Developer - Co-op
work.description:
Migrated and updated existing APIs to AWS which reduced overall cost by over 50%.
Analyzed user needs and software requirements to determine the feasibility of design within time and cost constraints.
Trained developers to use AWS and new APIs created.

work.title: Visiting Software Engineer - Co-op
work.description:
Analyzed information to determine, recommend, and plan the installation of a new system or modification of an existing system.
Remade existing code to work with new hardware and improve performance times and functions.
